mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize image sizes for faster loading and better responsiveness on mobile devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Consider implementing lazy loading for images and optimizing CSS and JavaScript to improve page load time.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more relevant meta descriptions, alt tags for images, and optimize header tags for better search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Improve the navigation menu layout for easier access to key pages like amenities and rooms.
